summary: like spidey is one of my favorite characters, he’s just so good and wants to do the right thing and doesn’t want anyone to...
body:
like spidey is one of my favorite characters, he’s just so good and wants to do the right thing and doesn’t want anyone to suffer. he even connects with villains and morally ambiguous guys bc he’s just… he’s usually really good at seeing all sides of something, things aren’t just black and white. he positively influences the people around him and wants to help them (even, at some points, to the detriment of himself)

hell, in one or two continuities of the Marvel universe, he’s actually hailed as the Greatest Hero of All Time in the future

he’s just. such a good dude. but i feel like no movie or media has quite lived up to that potential that he has, so i’m really looking forward to seeing Into the Spiderverse and see him mentoring Miles and becoming this parental figure and doing what he can for these new generation of Spideys and all this stuff

reblog.comment:

he’s just. such a good dude. but i feel like no movie or media has quite lived up to that potential that he has, so i’m really looking forward to seeing Into the Spiderverse and see him mentoring Miles and becoming this parental figure and doing what he can for these new generation of Spideys and all this stuff

tags: spider man: into the spider verse
summary: One thing I really liked about Into The Spider-verse was that they didn't have Miles and Gwen kiss at the end before she went...
body: One thing I really liked about Into The Spider-verse was that they didn’t have Miles and Gwen kiss at the end before she went back to her dimension. Most movies would have, but it definitely wasn’t earned in this case and I like the idea of them being friends, at least for now.

reblog.comment: One thing I really liked about Into The Spider-verse was that they didn’t have Miles and Gwen kiss at the end before she went back to her dimension. Most movies would have, but it definitely wasn’t earned in this case and I like the idea of them being friends, at least for now.

trail.content_raw: One thing I really liked about Into The Spider-verse was that they didn’t have Miles and Gwen kiss at the end before she went back to her dimension. Most movies would have, but it definitely wasn’t earned in this case and I like the idea of them being friends, at least for now.
trail.content: One thing I really liked about Into The Spider-verse was that they didn’t have Miles and Gwen kiss at the end before she went back to her dimension. Most movies would have, but it definitely wasn’t earned in this case and I like the idea of them being friends, at least for now.
